title: You're So Vain, You Probably Think This Trend Is About You 4/2: CDC, Rolling Stone, Bridgerton, US Capitol, Bhad Babie
itunes:title: You're So Vain, You Probably Think This Trend Is About You 4/2: CDC, Rolling Stone, Bridgerton, US Capitol, Bhad Babie
description:
On this edition of You're So Vain, You Probably Think This Trend Is About You Miles and Joelle discuss the new CDC guidelines, readers calling to boycott 'Rolling Stone', Rege-Jean Page not returning for 'Bridgerton' season 2, the attack near US Capitol, and Bhad Bhabie and her cavalcade of creeps.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
